metadata.title: CVE-2024-38619 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb-storage: alauda: Check whether the media is initializedThe member "uzonesize" of struct alauda_info will remain 0if alauda_init_media() fails, potentially causing divide errorsin alauda_read_data() and alauda_write_lba().- Add a member "media_initialized" to struct alauda_info.- Change a condition in alauda_check_media() to ensure the  first initialization.- Add an error check for the return value of alauda_init_media().

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
